title: Gujarat govt grants approval to establish Indian AI Research Organization in Gandhinagar's GIFT City
description: Gujarat news: State government grants approval to set up Indian AI Research Organization at GIFT City with Rs 300 crore allocation for AI research and development.

title: This trader says AI IPOs and a falling dollar could drive the S&P 500 to 8,200 next year
description: Samantha LaDuc has nailed some big calls on stocks in recent years. She sees another S&P 500 high coming in 2026, but an unhappy Main Street.

title: World needs more skilled people, as AI will create more jobs, says Google Brain founder Andrew Ng
description: At a time when many people worry that artificial intelligence will replace human jobs, a different view is coming from one of the world’s best-known AI leaders. Andrew Ng says the real challenge is not job loss but a lack of people who can actually build AI systems. Even as companies spend huge amounts of [...]

title: Nvidia Stock Gains. How Groq Can Help Defend Its AI Chip Dominance
Market resilience is encouraging amid AI weakness, says Baird's Mayfield
description: CNBC's "Squawk Box" team discusses markets on one of the last trading days of 2025 and what investors should be watching ...
